Title: FIRST_VALUE()
Description: FIRST_VALUE(expr) 返回窗口中的第一个值。
Examples:
SELECT
    n,
    FIRST_VALUE(n) OVER (PARTITION BY n MOD 2 ORDER BY n),
    FIRST_VALUE(n) OVER (PARTITION BY n <= 2 ORDER BY n)
FROM (
    SELECT 1 AS 'n'
    UNION
    SELECT 2
    UNION
    SELECT 3
    UNION
    SELECT 4
) a
ORDER BY
    n;
